DOC.brief_summary: Multi-center, observational, prospective cohort study including patients with multidrug-resistant tuberculosis at different sites in Germany. The aim the study is the identification of biomarkers for therapy response.
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers for Therapy Response in Drug-resistant Tuberculosis
DOC.detailed_description: The increasing rates of multidrug-resistant (MDR) tuberculosis (TB) are causing great concern. The current study that will be conducted at different centers in Germany. Biomarkers for treatment response during the course of the tuberculosis therapy will be evaluated. The study will be conducted with funding of the German Center for Infection Research (DZIF).
DOC.criteria: Subjects with confirmed pulmonary MDRTB Subject able and willing to give informed consent HIV infection physical or mental inability preventing study participation at the discretion of the investigator member of a vulnerable or special population (prisoner, soldier, mentally ill, under guardianship) age <18 years.
